com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans.session

Interface MachineCommandExecution<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - The type to which the result of executing the command is mapped.

    public interface MachineCommandExecution<R>
    Control of the execution of a platform machine command.
    See Also:
    MachineCommand.getExecution(java.nio.charset.Charset)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleError(InputStream error)
      Processes the error output to update, if necessary, the state of the execution.
      void handleInput(OutputStream input)
      Allows interaction with the machine system through the main input.
      void handleOutput(InputStream output)
      Processes the main output to update, if necessary, the state of the execution.
      R mapResult(int exitCode)
      Returns the resulting instance of the execution state, taking into account the exit code.

    • Method Detail

      • handleOutput

        void handleOutput(InputStream output)
           throws IOException
        Processes the main output to update, if necessary, the state of the execution.

        This method is called at the time command execution begins, in parallel with handleError(InputStream) and handleInput(OutputStream).

        Parameters:
        output - Main output of the command execution.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of an input failure during the process.

      • handleError

        void handleError(InputStream error)
          throws IOException
        Processes the error output to update, if necessary, the state of the execution.

        This method is called at the time command execution begins, in parallel with handleOutput(InputStream) and handleInput(OutputStream).

        Parameters:
        error - Error output of the command execution.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of an input failure during the process.

      • handleInput

        void handleInput(OutputStream input)
          throws IOException,
                 InterruptedException
        Allows interaction with the machine system through the main input.

        It can be kept waiting for some condition on the state of the execution to be fulfilled to produce some writing on the main output.

        This method is called at the time command execution begins, in parallel with handleOutput(InputStream) and handleError(InputStream).

        This method must terminate at least as soon as the call to mapResult(int) is made. After that, the effects of writing to the main output should have no effect on the system of the machine.

        Parameters:
        input - Main output of the command execution.
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of an output failure during the process.
        InterruptedException - In case some wait is interrupted due to the interruption of the thread that produces it.

      • mapResult

        R mapResult(int exitCode)
     throws Exception
        Returns the resulting instance of the execution state, taking into account the exit code.

        This method is called when the execution of the command on the system of the machine is complete, but not before the handleOutput(InputStream) and handleError(InputStream) calls have finished.

        Parameters:
        exitCode - The exit code returned by the machine system.
        Returns:
        The result of the operation, which will be returned by MachineSession.execute(MachineCommand).
        Throws:
        Exception - If the execution is considered failed.
